entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 late this morning. High 6. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening then becoming light late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
